response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,500,000 based on your needs and requirements. I understand its worth to you and appreciate the opportunity to share this exceptional offering with you.

To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between ensuring a fair return for our investment in the product development and providing you with an attractive deal that respects its true value to you.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information about the product, feel free to reach out to me directly. I am here to assist you in understanding how this product can meet your specific needs and expectations.

Looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
